4. Mayor Tim Short

Mayor Tim Short
===============

**TERM AND RESPONSIBILITIES**
-----------------------------

* Elected November 2023, serving until 2026

COUNCIL LIAISON TO
------------------

* Type A Wichita Falls Economic Development Corporation
* Type B Sales Tax Corporation
* City - County Hospital Board
* Emergency Medical Services
* Employee Benefits Trust Committee
* Metropolitan Planning Organization - Transportation Policy Committee Chair
* Nortex Regional Planning Commission
* Sheppard Military Affairs Committee
* Wichita-Wilbarger 911 Board

CITY COUNCIL GOALS
------------------

* Secure a generational water source for our city and the region
* Economic Growth
* Transparency in all things
* Improving city government interactions with citizens and business
* A vibrant and growing downtown
* Ensuring public safety

PROFESSIONAL
------------

* Owner/Agent State Farm Insurance Agency
* Series 6 Securities License (1998)
* Series 63 Securities License (1998)
* Series 65 Securities License (2018)

EDUCATION
---------

* Shallowater High School (1983)
* Texas Tech University BA Telecommunications (1988)
* National Association of Financial Advisors LUTCF (2005)

PERSONAL
--------

* Married to Kerri since 1991, has one son, Parker, and a daughter-in-law, Macie.
* Member of Grace Church
* 3x President of Wichita Falls Kiwanis Club
* 2x President of Hundred Club of Wichita Falls
* Current delivery driver for Meals on Wheels of Wichita County since 2010
* Current Board Member of Meals on Wheels of Wichita County
